resources.string: Deal 25/50/75/100% more attack damage in beast form.
Additional 100 point bonus to Health and Stamina in beast form.
Beast form lasts 50% longer and feeding extends the duration 50% more.
Frenzy attacks (one-handed standing power attacks) in beast form stun targets for the duration.
Back hand attacks (two-handed standing power attacks) in beast form disarm targets.
Leap attacks (two-handed sprinting power attacks) in beast form do a critical strike equal to twice your Stamina and throw targets.
Power attacks in beast form cost 25% less Stamina and do 25% more damage.
Beast form attacks do an additional 10/20 points of bleed damage, healing you for the same amount.
Power attacks in beast form can hit multiple targets in front of you.
Movement speed is increased by 10%, both in and out of beast form.
Regenerate an additional 1/2% of your maximum Health and Stamina per second, both in and out of beast form.
Give your follower the beastblood by trading Werebeast Blood with them. No effect on vampires.
Werebeast Howl of Brotherhood calls Ice Wolves or Snow Bears/Werewolves or Werebears instead.
Werebeast Howl of the Hunt shatters locks up to Adept/Expert level at close range.
Werebeast Howl of Terror affects even dragons, forcing them to land for 30/60 seconds.
Able to feed off the undead in beast form, and loot their corpses.
No longer forced to transform at night.
The frequency of Silver Hand Elite werebeast hunters is reduced by 80%.
